name: Cosm (daveisawesome)
description:
My tribute to the classic "hollywood hacker" movies, where the hacker's fingers are constantly moving as random junk flies across the monitor.

Provide support to two goons breaking into a megacorp. Keep your eyes on your screen while your fingers frantically fly across your keyboard. Stay calm, stay focused, and maybe you can come away with the gear that Mr. Johnson requires - the same gear that will convince him to forget about that unfortunate incident back in Antigua.

I started coding in Unity less than a week ago, and this is what I've got. Thanks for checking it out!

I'm not charging anything for this game, but donations are always appreciated.

If you find anything broken, please let me know! You can contact me here, or on Twitter @db_twit.

Please note that this is a single-player game. It is NOT intended to be two-player. 

Although I suppose you could do two-player if you really wanted to. If anyone tries it this way, please let me know!
